column1: Kata Robata////The Ramen here is top notch. It's not too salty and the broth is very flavorful. The texture of the noodles is just right - not too hard but also not too soft. My favorite part about the dish is the hard boiled egg. It may just be an egg
column2: but the yolk is amazing and goes well with everything else! It's the perfect dish to eat on a cold day
column3: especially since the dish comes out steaming hot. For $14 it's not considered cheap
column4: but it's also not instant either!
